metadata.title: Khanomak Women's High Rise Basic Long Bodycon Pencil Back Slit Skirt
features: Product Style: Long bodycon stretch pencil skirt, fit for everyday dressing you can wear in any season!
This pencil skirt is a wardrobe essential, featuring an elasticized waistband and bodycon silhouette.
68% Rayon 27% Nylon 5% Spandex, Imported, Hand wash cold.
description: Pencil skirts have always been a favorite and this little number doesnâ€™t disappoint. This skirt is sure to make an impression. With a versatile Knee length style and a slit back finish, it's suitable for all shapes and sizes. Just pair with a simple black top and heels for a gorgeous evening look.
